freecycle.label: Freecycle
freecycle.description: Take stuff. Bring stuff. Waste less! Donate ahead of time or come to Earth Day to swap. All leftover items will be donated.

takebackthetap.label: Take Back The Tap Challenge
takebackthetap.description: Can you tell the difference between tap water and bottled water? Try the challenge to find out
